003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.corenlpknowledgebasepopulation.xml.definition;
004
005import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlRootElement;
006
007import edu.stanford.nlp.coref.md.DependencyCorefMentionFinder;
008import edu.stanford.nlp.pipeline.CorefAnnotator;
009import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.xml.definition.AbstractProcessingStepParameter;
010
011/**
012 * Parameter for specifying a coreference mention model to use with
013 * {@link DependencyCorefMentionFinder}, whose methods are called by
014 * {@link CorefAnnotator}. It is assumed that it doesn't use constituency parse
015 * (i.e. {@code coref.useConstituencyParse} is {@code false}).
016 *
017 * @author Alejandro González García
018 */
019@XmlRootElement(name = "coreferenceMentionDetectionModel")
020public final class CoreferenceMentionDetectionModelProcessingStepParameter extends AbstractProcessingStepParameter {}
